page.description: Specify any help text you would like to show in the Editor or Editor Set when the field is being edited.

section.description: The value for this property will be available in the 'settings' object that is passed to the Javascript function when the editor and editor set for this field is opened. The property name in the 'settings' object is 'help Text'.
